Skinn Cosmetics Lip 6X Balm (Strawberry Daiquiri) Skinn Cosmetics {'Brand': 'Skinn Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Flavor': 'Strawberry Daiquiri', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.7 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '729440770884'} I like this stuff! It feels good on my lips. Gives a nice tint, too. Recommend Mane-ly Long Hair Detangler/Polisher 8oz. Mane-ly Long Hair ['MLH Denatngle/Polisher'] {'Product Benefits': 'Use on a Dirty/Dry or Clean/Wet Mane, Tail, Feathers & Forelock', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.6 x 1.9 x 1.7 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '608729173847', 'Manufacturer': 'TTL', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Used it in my golden retriever. Too oily.
Normally use coconut and it’s good for her (healthy) skin and enjoys it. For my golden I’d not re-order. Lucky Teeth Organic Toothpaste-All Natural, Remineralizes and Fortifies Teeth and Gums. (2 oz 1 Pack) Lucky Teeth {'Brand': 'Lucky Teeth', 'Flavor': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Form': 'Paste', 'Material Type Free': 'Fluoride Free, Gluten Free, Glycerin Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 1.5 x 2.75 inches; 2.56 Ounces', 'UPC': '636160246936', 'Manufacturer': 'Lucky Teeth'} This toothpaste is good. That said, I got what I paid for here. It’s not anything earth shattering, it won’t make your teeth any cleaner than another toothpaste, help your gums heal, etc. but it IS a healthier choice! For that I give it 4 thoughtful stars. Tastes good as well. Tastes good Michel Design Works Oversized Triple Milled Bath Soap Bar, Avocado, Large, 8.7 Ounce Michel Design Works ['This substantial 8.7-ounce bath bar contains only the finest ingredients - pure vegetable palm oil, glycerin, and rich, moisturizing shea butter. Handmade in Sussex, England, these bars are triple-milled to produce a completely uniform, long-lasting soap. Imbued with carefully chosen Michel Design Works fragrances, every bath will be a luxurious one. Michel Design Works was created by Bruce & Deborah Michel in the early 1980s. The first product was an elaborate “memory book” called Our Country Diary. Still a favorite today, it is filled with vintage artwork, quirky quotes, notable dates and plenty of room to record all the events of the year. Our Country Diary will become a beautiful record of your family life. When they first created their signature elephant logo, it signified a remembrance of all things special. Although Michel Design Works has greatly expanded into bath & body, home fragrance and decor, when Bruce & Deborah remember and celebrate all of their wonderful customers and the company’s history, it is even more fitting today! Whether you are a new or a long-time friend, we welcome you to enjoy the art, lather up with our English soaps, set an elegant table with napkins, candles, plates, and serveware, and end your day with wonderfully fragrant n bubble bath.'] {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Avocado', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SOAL259', 'UPC': '608666698793', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design Works'} I like big bars and I cannot lie.
This is rich, luxurious and long lasting.
It makes my skin smell good, feel good and as a bonus the whole bathroom smells good! Great BIG bar! Michel Design Works Large Bath Soap Bar - Flamingo Michel Design Works {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 2.1 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666722917'} What I love (and ALL the bar soaps I’ve ever purchased from this vendor has been wonderful) :
Oversized! It lasts a really LONG time ...no little slivers..it’s a great value!
Smells entirely wonderful...the scent wafts out of the bathroom ...into the hallway and makes the air I breath so beautiful (for both my husband AND myself). Makes for a good nights sleep.
Comes well packaged. Not shrink wrapped & difficult to access. The scent is nice so I like to stock up and have a drawer of them to scent our bathrooms until used.
I don’t know how they do this quality at this price...but it’s the best soap at the best price. Go get some, you’ll be happy too. These seem to just be the best bar soaps 🧼 on the market today Michel Design Works Triple Milled Shea Butter Bath Soap Bar, Tranquility Michel Design Works {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Michel Design Works', 'Scent': 'Amber, Peach', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.69 x 2.4 x 2.01 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '608666716718', 'Manufacturer': 'Michel Design'} Very nice (for us). The scent wafts out of the bathroom, into the bedroom and the hall. So we really enjoy the ritual of the scent. Thank you. Big bar, well made, last’s long smells divine
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Affinity:** The user continues to favor lip care products while embracing luxurious bath soaps, particularly those that enhance their bathing experience. Their interest in hair care, specifically detanglers and polishers, remains active, alongside a sustained exploration of holistic oral care.

- **Ingredients & Formulations:** They prioritize versatile products across categories, favoring natural ingredients and healthier alternatives. Their latest interactions highlight a commitment to high-quality, long-lasting personal care items.

- **Sensory Experience:** Highly attuned to sensory attributes, the user seeks products with rich textures and captivating fragrances. Recent experiences emphasize a love for fragrances that create an inviting ambiance, especially those that linger throughout their space.

- **Positive Engagement:** Maintaining a discerning approach, the user values products that prioritize health and sensory pleasure, showing an increasing selectivity in their interactions and ratings.

- **Brand Loyalty:** While exhibiting strong loyalty to effective brands, the user is receptive to exploring new offerings that meet their quality and health standards, particularly those delivering an exceptional sensory experience.

- **Overall Rating Trend:** The user maintains an optimistic outlook on personal care products. They continue to focus on enriching experiences and prioritize quality over quantity, reflecting a commitment to finding remarkable value in their purchases. Their recent interactions reinforce their enjoyment of products that create a memorable ritual and enhance overall well-being.
